mapper.insert: insert into approval_record(record_no, appr_no, line_no) values(approval_record_seq.nextval, #{apprNo}, (select min(line_no) from receiver_line where receiver_no = #{receiverNo}))
mapper.select: select t1.record_no, t1.appr_status, t1.assign_date, t1.check_date, t1.confirm_date, t1.appr_no, t1.line_no from approval_record t1, approval t2, receiver_line t3 where t1.appr_no = t2.appr_no and t1.line_no = t3.line_no
select t2.appr_status from approval t1, approval_record t2, receiver_line t3 where t1.apprNo = #{apprNo} and t1.apprNo = t2.apprNo and t2.line_no = t3.line_no and t3.line_order = 1
